snippet.title: TV Schedule | Cartoon Network Show Listings
snippet.description: Find a complete schedule of local listings for all your favorite shows. Discover what to watch and when to find it on Cartoon Network.

snippet.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
snippet.description: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules. In theaters 3/25/11! Get behind the scenes access and see exclusive videos from the new movie!

snippet.title: Fun Dungeon Face Off/Pretty Great Day With a Girl
snippet.description: Fun Dungeon: Clarence's Mom treats Clarence, Jeff and Sumo to an afternoon at Rough Riders Chicken. Pretty Great Day with a Girl: Clarence and Amy, a unique girl from down the street, bond over a hunt for a monster-sized rock called an "erratic."

snippet.title: Conversation Parade
snippet.description: Beemo creates a new video game for Finn and Jake. Watch more Adventure Time on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Imagination Land
snippet.description: Finn meets the inhabitants of his imagination land. Watch more Adventure Time on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Invisible Monster
snippet.description: When Finn turns off Jake's imagination, he realizes he's made a horrible mistake. Watch more Adventure Time on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Mastering Reality
snippet.description: Jake's imagination runs wild. Watch more Adventure Time on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: The Test of the Riddle
snippet.description: Finn must solve the riddle of the imaginary riddle master. Watch more Adventure Time on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Team USA Gold Medal Winners
snippet.description: Rico and Raini Rodriguez honor the gold medal-winning athletes from the 2012 London Games. Watch the Hall of Game Awards on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid Icarus
snippet.description: Kid Icarus tries to survive the first day in a new school. Watch more MAD on Cartoon Network!
